text_block_list.text: Derby's greatest lineup ever. That's what they said.

That she was not a special among the glittering 
members that were there at the time.
But, “I'm me”.

It doesn't matter if you lost in the past, it doesn't matter now, 
but as she slowly releases everything in the last straight, and 
takes the lead she shone like light.
The name of that light is Eishin Flash
“I will go my way” Because strong people believe in themselves.

Winning Tickets first round of the classic front the 
“SatsukiShou” ended in defeat.
The next dayー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh～～

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, next up is slope training?

Just after the race. I told her that it would be ok to take a 
break, but Winning Ticket is still running today.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh…? No, I'm alright.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Besides I can't afford to rest for one 
day, that's what I thought… Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So with that said, I'm going to do slope training!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
She's always emotional, so I thought 
she would cry when she lost but…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I do not feel her usual bottomless spirit. I think her losing the 
“SatsukiShou” was that big of a shock.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Next time she loses will be in the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, please make sure to firmly look over Ticket-san.

Even though I said so, I had no idea what 
to do with the current Winning Ticket.

After the training, I went back to my trainer room and there 
stood Winning Ticket alone.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san.
Did you forget something?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No, I just wanted to watch a video of a race.

What Winning Ticket was watching was a video of 
the Derby, which I always used to watch. It's common 
for her to watch race footage here.

However, even though she would always shout with emotion, this 
time, she's staring at the image quietly today.
choice_data_list: Now it's Tickezou's turn to take the stage of the Derby.
Now it's Tickezou's turn to take the stage of the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? Y-Yeah… that's right. On this stage 
that I have seen many times, I also.

Winning Ticket that always seems to be unable to suppress her 
excitement when it comes to talk about the Derby, but it's 
somehow difficult today
The “SatsukiShou” was a pity.
The “SatsukiShou” was a pity.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Say, Trainer-san. Can I say something selfish?
Of course…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Racing is like, there are times when you lose right?

That's right, but you are making an effort 
to not lose, isn't that right?

That's right, but you are making an effort 
to not lose, isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
However, efforts were made to achieve the “SatsukiShou”. I did 
what I wanted to do.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But… I still lost. I know now, racing is not easy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then, the images I was always excited to see, they like 
appeared as something else…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was also impressed by the appearance of the losing person, and 
the drama was so exciting.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I didn't understand at all the feelings of the losing person… the 
feelings of the person whose dreams have been broken…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah ha… you seem nervous, me!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then, if I don't come back soon, the dorm supervisor will get 
angry! See you tomorrow, Trainer-san!

In the trainer room where Winning Ticket had left, only the sound 
of the Derby video was flowing.
